Plot Kalman filter estimate

Source: R/kalman_filter_gen.R
plot.KF.Rd

The function plots the observed time serie, the sum of the estimated states and the confidence intervals of the estimate

# S3 method for KF
plot(x, plot_state = "all", ...)

Arguments

x

A KF object resulting from the function kalman_filter
plot_state

A numeric value indicating which state to plot. Default is "all".
...

Additional arguments affecting the plot produced.

Examples

#Filter a 2*AR1 + DR + RW + WN process
set.seed(123)
model = AR(.3, 2) + AR(.5,3) + DR(.1) + RW(3) + WN(4)
n = 250
y = gen_lts(n = n, model = model)
my_res = kalman_filter(model = model, y = y)
plot(my_res)
plot(my_res, plot_state = 3)
